greeting.title: Greeting Title!
greeting.body: Greeting Body. We'd love to get feedback from you on our app.

status.body: Status message. We will respond to your message soon.

automated_message.body: We're sorry to hear that you don't love Sky's App!  Is there anything we could do to make it better?

error_messages.http_error_title: It looks like we're having trouble sending your message.
error_messages.http_error_body: We've saved it and will try sending it again soon.
error_messages.network_error_title: It looks like you aren't connected to the Internet right now.
error_messages.network_error_body: We've saved your message and will try again when we detect a connection.
